> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight moved with repulsion when Saberback touched her and then with
> horror when she realized that something horrible may happen at Tucson.
>
> She struggled while she was pushed against her will wherever her captors
> lead her

<NEW>

SABERBACK just laughed wickedly as he saw the dawning of comprehension
of NIGHTLIGHT's optics. "Yes, your friends came for you." he smiled
evilly as he leaned in to look into her optics, his own optics dark
and terrible. "Your friends came to rescue you, and now they will be
put to death for their loyalty to you."

SABERBACK turned to walk down the hall again, "And more are coming,
and they too will die." He laughed again, "So you see? You are
forfilling a purpose."

(TAG)

- Preston
